sourcesContent:
import { useState, useEffect } from "react"
import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles'
import Container from '@material-ui/core/Container'
import Box from '@material-ui/core/Box'
import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button'
import Grid from '@material-ui/core/Grid'
import Icon from '@material-ui/core/Icon';
import Typography from '@material-ui/core/Typography'



const useStyles = makeStyles(theme => ({
  root: {
    width: "100%",
    height:70,
    background: "#FFF",
    borderBottom: "1px solid #ccc",
    padding:15,
  },
  filter: {
    marginRight:15,
    position:'relative',
    height:'auto',
  },
  popover: {
    position:'absolute',
    bottom:-110,
    width:300,
    height:100,
    zIndex:2000,
    background:"#efe",
    overflow:'visible',

    '&::after': {
    	borderWidth: 30,
    	marginLeft: -30,
      bottom: '100%',
	    left: '50%',
      content:  '" "',
	    height: 0,
	    width: 0,
	    position: 'absolute',
	    pointerEvents: 'none',
      borderColor: 'transparent',
	    borderBottomColor: '#88b7d5',
      border: 'solid transparent',
    },

    '&::before': {
    	borderWidth: 30,
    	marginLeft: -30,
      bottom: '100%',
	    left: '50%',
      content:  '" "',
	    height: 0,
	    width: 0,
	    position: 'absolute',
	    pointerEvents: 'none',
      borderColor: 'transparent',
	    borderBottomColor: '#88b7d5',
      border: 'solid transparent',
    }

  },

}));

const FilterBar = props => {
  const classes = useStyles()
  const [openFilter, setOpenFilter] = useState(null)

  return (
      <Box className={classes.root} p={1}>
        <Box className={classes.filter} display="inline-block">
          <Button onMouseOver={() => setOpenFilter(1)} onMouseOut={() => setOpenFilter(null)} variant="outlined" color="secondary">Client Type: All<Icon>expand_more</Icon></Button>
          <Box className={classes.popover}>Filter 1</Box>
        </Box>
        <Box className={classes.filter} display="inline-block">
          <Button onMouseOver={() => setOpenFilter(2)} onMouseOut={() => setOpenFilter(null)} variant="outlined" color="secondary">Specialty: All<Icon>expand_more</Icon></Button>
          {(openFilter === 2) && <Box className={classes.popover}>Filter 2</Box> }
        </Box>
        <Box className={classes.filter} display="inline-block">
          <Button onMouseOver={() => setOpenFilter(3)} onMouseOut={() => setOpenFilter(null)} variant="outlined" color="secondary">Treatment: All<Icon>expand_more</Icon></Button>
          {(openFilter === 3) && <Box className={classes.popover}>Filter 3</Box> }
        </Box>
      </Box>
  )
}

export default FilterBar
